title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 9
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 9
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" EZCorp (EZPW). EZCorp Inc.'s shares are headded for their biggest gain in two months after the pawn-shop operator reached a deal to expand its Latin American business. The company bought Guatemala-based GuatePrenda - MaxiEfectivo, or GPMX, which operates 112 pawn shops in its home country, El Salvador, Honduras and Peru. The $113 million deal will increase the number of shops that EZCorp has in Latin American by about 45 percent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
